mapper.select: SELECT T1.RV_IDX /* SEQUENCE */ , T1.COMMENT /* 후기내용 */ , T1.RATING /* 평가점수 */ , T1.REG_DT /* 등록일시 */ , T1.REG_ID /* 등록자 */ , T1.MOD_DT /* 수정일시 */ , T1.MOD_ID /* 수정자 */ , T1.DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ , UR.USER_ID /* 고객아이디 */ , UR.USER_NAME /* 고객명 */ , T3.RM_IDX /* RM_IDX */ , T3.RT_IDX /* RT_IDX */ , T3.CR_IDX /* CR_IDX */ , T4.MODEL_NAME /* 차량모델명 */ , T4.MODEL_DETAIL_NAME /* 차량모델디테일 */ , T4.CAR_NUMBER , T5.COMPANY_NAME , COUNT(T6.RV_IDX) AS IMG_COUNT FROM DC_USER_REVIEW T1 LEFT JOIN DC_RESERVE_MASTER T3 ON T1.RM_IDX = T3.RM_IDX LEFT JOIN DC_USER_INFO UR ON T3.UR_IDX = UR.UR_IDX LEFT JOIN DC_CAR_INFO T4 ON T3.CR_IDX = T4.CR_IDX LEFT JOIN DC_RENT_COMPANY T5 ON T3.RT_IDX = T5.RT_IDX LEFT JOIN DC_USER_REVIEW_FILE T6 ON T1.RV_IDX = T6.RV_IDX GROUP BY T1.RV_IDX

SELECT T1.RV_IDX /* SEQUENCE */ , T1.COMMENT /* 후기내용 */ , T1.RATING /* 평가점수 */ , T1.REG_DT /* 등록일시 */ , T1.REG_ID /* 등록자 */ , T1.MOD_DT /* 수정일시 */ , T1.MOD_ID /* 수정자 */ , T1.DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ , UR.USER_ID /* 고객아이디 */ , UR.USER_NAME /* 고객명 */ , T3.RM_IDX /* RM_IDX */ , T3.RT_IDX /* RT_IDX */ , T3.CR_IDX /* CR_IDX */ , T4.MODEL_NAME /* 차량모델명 */ , T4.MODEL_DETAIL_NAME /* 차량모델디테일 */ , T4.CAR_NUMBER , T5.COMPANY_NAME , T5.COMPANY_ZIPCODE FROM DC_USER_REVIEW T1 LEFT JOIN DC_RESERVE_MASTER T3 ON T1.RM_IDX = T3.RM_IDX LEFT JOIN DC_USER_INFO UR ON T3.UR_IDX = UR.UR_IDX LEFT JOIN DC_CAR_INFO T4 ON T3.CR_IDX = T4.CR_IDX LEFT JOIN DC_RENT_COMPANY T5 ON T3.RT_IDX = T5.RT_IDX WHERE T1.RV_IDX = #{rvIdx}
